questions.question: Tell me about yourself.
Why are you interested in this role?
Why are you interested in our company?
Why are you looking to leave your current position?
Tell me about a time you worked on a team.
Describe a time you had a conflict with a coworker. How did you resolve it?
Have you ever worked with a difficult person? How did you handle it?
Describe a difficult challenge or problem you faced at work and how you handled it.
Describe a time you made a mistake. What did you do and what did you learn?
Walk me through your resume.
Tell me about a time when priorities changed suddenly. What did you do?
Tell me about a time you took the lead on a project.
Describe a time you went above and beyond your job responsibilities.
Have you ever had to motivate others? How did you do it?
What is your greatest professional accomplishment?
Tell me about a time you failed. What did you learn from it?
What would you do if you disagreed with a decision your manager made?
How would you handle a customer who is angry and upset?
If you were given a project with an impossible deadline, what would you do?
How would you handle a coworker who wasn't pulling their weight on a team project?
What are your greatest strengths?
What is your greatest weakness?
How do you handle stress or pressure?
How do you stay organized?
What software or tools are you familiar with?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
What are your long-term career goals?
What motivates you?
What are you looking for in a new position?

types.behavioral: Questions about past experiences and behavior
types.technical: Questions testing technical knowledge and skills
types.icebreaker: Questions to learn more about the candidate
